Text: If you notice, this is an update, so you need to have Battery 4 already installed.. Also, I had to batchmod the stand alone for this update.. haven't checked the plugins yet...
AU also works fine in Logic
@Dr. Howard: No kidding! Yes, I know how to read, but this does not answer our question, replace WHAT, WHERE?

well, if you downloaded this, you'd find a replacement for what you had already installed: Stand Alone, AU, VST, and DPM ...

I take it you know where these live, right?

is a virtual instrument, in this case of batteries.
you use to make music with programs that use:
  VST (cubase or other editor)
  au (logic or tools)
RTAS. (protools)
these three (VST, AU, RTAS) plug-ins are.
exploited by many software, but always in the field of music or audio.

This update (4.0.2) without the previous relase installed does not help, missing audio libraries ..
